content:
I've been really enjoying experimenting with different textures lately. I love combining smooth papers with rough fabrics, or incorporating found objects with interesting textures into my artwork. It adds a whole new dimension to the piece and creates a lot of visual interest. I've also been playing around with different ways to add texture to my fabric, like using fabric paint, gel medium, or even just layering fabric scraps on top of each other.

I've also been interested in trying out some natural dyeing techniques on my fabrics. I've heard it can create some really unique and interesting colors, and I love the idea of using natural materials to create art. Have you ever tried natural dyeing, or do you have any experience with it?
